nodes.text: A'Lerris Verata was a Human female who was the Mining Chief Operator of the Tatoo system's mining efforts during the time of the Galactic Civil War. She was often seen patrolling the area around Nallera's Mining Field in her Z-95 Headhunter.

A'Lerris Verata appeared in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
